Translations.Text: Arau tomara purbe ami yi raachulake'i praerana karaicho te'omra ocarata e'itorae'i ahi karaicho ye, ‘mora bahirae ana kono satya ilaha na'i, seye tomaloke kerala morae'i ibadata karaa’
Arau sihamte kaya, ‘rahamane (allahe) santana grahana karaiche’. Te'om paraitra mahana! Baram te'omloka te'omra sanmanita banda
Te'omloke te'omra agadharai namate; te'omloke kerala te'omra adesa anusarae'i kama karae

Te'omlokara sanmukhata arau pichata yi ache se'i sakalo te'om jane. Arau te'omloke chuparaicha karae kerala sihamtara babe'i yisakalara prati te'om santusta arau te'omloke te'omra bhayata bhita santrasta
Arau te'omlokara majata yiye ka’ba, ‘allahara bahirae maye'i ilaha’, taka ami jahannamara sastira pratidana dima; e'idarae'i ami yalimasakalaka pratidana di'om

Yisakale kupharai karae sihamte dekha na'i neki ye, akasasamuha arau prthirai otapraotabharae milita hai achila, tara pichata ami ubhayaka prthaka karai dilo; arau praanabana sakalo bastuke panira paraa srsti karailo; tathapi'o sihamte imana posana nakaraiba ne
arau prthiraita ami srsti karaicho sudrrha parbata, yate prthiraiye sihamtaka lai tharaka-baraka nakarae, arau tata ami taiyara karaicho prasasta patha, yate sihamte gantabyasthalata gai paya
Arau ami akasaka karaicho suraksita cada; kintu sihamte akasata arasthita nidarsanaralira paraa mukha ghuraa'i laya
Arau allahe'i srsti karaiche raati arau dina, surya arau candra; pratyeke'i nija nija kaksapathata bicarana karae
Arau ami tomara purbe'o kono manuhaka cirajirai karaa nachilo, gatike yadi tumi mrtyubarana karaa tente sihamte cirajirai hai thakiba neki
pratito jira'i mrtyura soraada grahana karaiba; ami tomalokaka bhala arau beyara dbaraa bisesabharae paraiksa karai thako, arau amara ocarate'i tomalokara ubhati ahiba lagiba
